quizName: Fresh Prince of Bel-Air TV Show Quiz

questions.question: What is the name of the main character in 'Fresh Prince of Bel-Air'?
questions.explanation: Will Smith plays the main character, who shares the same first name in the show.

questions.question: What is the name of the wealthy family that Will moves in with?
questions.explanation: Will moves in with the Banks family, who live in the upscale neighborhood of Bel-Air.

questions.question: What is the name of Will's best friend in Bel-Air?
questions.explanation: Jazz, played by DJ Jazzy Jeff, is Will's best friend in Bel-Air who often visits the Banks household.

questions.question: What is the name of the butler who serves the Banks family?
questions.explanation: Geoffrey Butler, portrayed by Joseph Marcell, is the sophisticated butler who serves the Banks family.

questions.question: Which character is known for his signature dance, 'The Carlton'?
questions.explanation: Carlton Banks, played by Alfonso Ribeiro, is known for his iconic dance move called 'The Carlton'.

questions.question: What is the name of Will's cousin who often causes trouble?
questions.explanation: Hilary Banks, portrayed by Karyn Parsons, is Will's cousin who often finds herself in comedic and mischievous situations.

questions.question: What is the name of Will's on-and-off love interest throughout the series?
questions.explanation: Lisa, portrayed by Nia Long, is Will's on-and-off love interest throughout the series, adding a romantic element to the show.

questions.question: What is the occupation of Philip Banks, the patriarch of the family?
questions.explanation: Philip Banks, played by James Avery, is a successful lawyer and the patriarch of the Banks family.

questions.question: What is the name of Will's mother in the show?
questions.explanation: Viola Smith, portrayed by Vernee Watson, is Will's mother who appears in several episodes throughout the series.

questions.question: What is the theme song of 'Fresh Prince of Bel-Air'?
questions.explanation: The theme song of 'Fresh Prince of Bel-Air' is famously titled 'Fresh Prince' and is performed by Will Smith.
